creator: anto22in@yahoo.co.in
text:
When a servlet is recompiled the tomcat server says that it cannot load the 
Oracle9i JDBC Driver. The message is
java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError:Native Library d:\oracle\ora90\ocijdbc9.dll 
already loaded in another classloader.
   There was no problem with oracle 9i in Windows NT. It occurred when we 
upgraded to Windows 2000 Server and oracle 9i.


From error stack


....
...
oracle.jdbc.oci8.OCIDBACCESS.logon(294)
oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleConnection.<init>(307)
......

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
On reviewing this bug:
- there is insufficient information to reproduce it
- the change that caused the bug was a move from NT to 2000

Based mainly on the OS change causing the issue I am going to assume that this
is not a Tomcat issue. Please feel free to re-open if you have evidence to
support the position that this is not the case.

Note that issues like this should first be discussed on the tomcat-user mailing
list.
